headline: The G.O.A.T. Returns: HOKA Unveils the New Speedgoat 7
summary: GOLETA, Calif., February 01, 2026--HOKA®, a division of Deckers Brands (NYSE: DECK), introduces the Speedgoat 7, the next evolution from one of its most celebrated franchises. A trusted companion across every type of terrain, the Speedgoat 7 is engineered for performance on rocky ascents, slick mud, technical downhills, and everything in between. Bold in design and color, the Speedgoat 7 doesn’t just tackle the trail, it makes a statement on it. Built for runners who push limits, thrive in the e
